body_html:
I think it's because the sanity check failed (which aborts everything else).

https://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pull-requests-sanity/5397/console

Suggests that the problem is that the BUILD files are failing 'buildifier'. If you see our CONTRIBUTING.md file, there will be instructions for how to automatically format BUILD files (kind of like clang-format). That should probably solve the problem!

body:
I think it's because the sanity check failed (which aborts everything else).  

https://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tensorflow-pull-requests-sanity/5397/console

Suggests that the problem is that the BUILD files are failing 'buildifier'.  If you see our CONTRIBUTING.md file, there will be instructions for how to automatically format BUILD files (kind of like clang-format).  That should probably solve the problem!
